item.title: 印度证券交易委员会建议放宽大型 IPO 的最低股票发售规模
item.description: 根据周一发布的一份咨询文件，印度市场监管机构 SEBI 建议降低公司在进行大型 IPO 时必须向公众出售的最低股份比例，并修订满足最低公众持股比例要求的时间表。【原文：India’s markets regulator SEBI has proposed reducing the minimum percentage of shares that a company must sell to the public for large IPOs as well as amended timeline to meet minimum public shareholding requirements, according to a consultation paper Monday.】

item.title: 礼来利用高等级债券市场，发行罕见的 40 年期债券
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. is tapping the US investment-grade debt market with a deal that’s expected to include a 40-year bond, a rarity in a world characterized by high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 康卡斯特的 MSNBC 将在 Versant 分拆后更名为 MS NOW
item.description: 随着康卡斯特公司（Comcast Corp. ）旗下的 NBCUniversal 将其部分媒体品牌分拆为一家名为 Versant 的独立公司，政治新闻网络 MSNBC 正准备更名。【原文：Political news network MSNBC is preparing to change its name as Comcast Corp.’s NBCUniversal spins off some of its media brands into a separate company called Versant.】

item.title: 以太坊大力支持者释放数十亿资金进军华尔街
item.description: 上周，在曼哈顿第 42 街西普里阿尼酒店（Cipriani 42nd Street）的大银行大厅里，加密货币的拥护者们聚集在大理石圆柱和吊灯下，宣告一个新的金融时代的到来；这个时代远远超越了比特币。【原文：In the grand banking hall of Cipriani 42nd Street in Manhattan last week, crypto advocates gathered beneath marble columns and chandeliers to declare the arrival of a new financial era — one that goes way beyond Bitcoin.】

item.title: 肯尼亚考虑从侨民债券中筹集多达 5 亿美元资金
item.description: 肯尼亚希望通过向居住在国外的公民借款来缓解公共财政的紧张状况，计划发行 2.5 亿至 5 亿美元的所谓侨民债券。【原文：Kenya, which wants to ease tight public finances by borrowing from citizens living abroad, plans to get the ball rolling with a so-called diaspora bond of between $250 million and $500 million.】

item.title: 全球不确定性加剧，智利经济增长放缓
item.description: 由于高失业率和全球不确定性等不利因素影响了拉丁美洲最富裕国家之一智利的经济活动，智利经济在 4 月至 6 月期间出现了季度性下滑。【原文：Chile’s economy down-shifted on quarterly basis in the April-June period as headwinds including high unemployment and global uncertainty tempered activity in one of Latin America’s richest nations.】

item.title: 莫迪称 "朋友 "普京分享了特朗普会晤的收获
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）说，他接到了 "朋友 "弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）总统的电话，普京分享了他对最近在阿拉斯加与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤的见解，这是另一个信号，表明尽管受到华盛顿方面的反弹，新德里与莫斯科之间的关系依然牢固。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said he received a phone call from his “friend” President Vladimir Putin, who shared his insights on a recent meeting with US President Donald Trump in Alaska, in another signal that ties between New Delhi and Moscow remain strong despite backlash from Washington.】

item.title: 中加关系恶化，中国寻求重开澳大利亚油菜籽贸易
item.description: 中国正在努力重启与澳大利亚中断了五年的油菜籽贸易，以确保这种关键动物饲料原料的供应，因为中国与澳大利亚的头号供应国加拿大的关系正在恶化。【原文：China is working to reopen rapeseed trade with Australia after a five-year pause, seeking to secure supplies of a key animal feed ingredient as ties with top supplier Canada sour.】

item.title: 高利率导致巴西经济活动连续第二个月下滑
item.description: 随着巴西央行激进的加息政策开始生效，巴西 6 月份的经济活动连续第二个月出现下滑。【原文：Brazil’s economic activity declined for a second straight month in June as the central bank’s aggressive interest rate hikes begin to take hold.】

item.title: 南非矿业游说团对法律草案提出反馈意见和担忧
item.description: 南非矿业游说团体表示，它已提交了对该行业立法草案的修改建议，但对尚未公布的附加法规的影响表示担忧。【原文：South Africa’s mining lobby group said it submitted proposed changes to draft legislation for the sector, but is concerned about the impact of additional regulation that’s yet to be published.】

item.title: 莫迪减税计划引发财政担忧，印度债券下滑
item.description: 印度债券创下近两年来最大跌幅，原因是上周信用评级上调带来的乐观情绪被对政府削减消费税计划的财政担忧所掩盖。【原文：Indian bonds fell by the most in almost two years, as optimism from last week’s credit rating upgrade was overshadowed by fiscal concerns over the government’s plan to cut consumption taxes.】

item.title: 挪威 2 万亿美元基金将出售更多以色列公司
item.description: 挪威2万亿美元的主权财富基金宣布将出售更多的以色列公司，这是该基金为回应公众对其与加沙战争有关的投资的强烈抗议而采取的最新举措。【原文：Norway’s $2 trillion sovereign wealth fund announced it is selling more Israeli companies in its latest move to address the public uproar over its investments linked to the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 中国化石燃料使用量下降，电力需求却在激增
item.description:
尽管今年七月酷热难耐，但煤炭和天然气的消耗量却有所下降，这表明美国推动清洁能源的努力正在取得成效。【原文：

Coal and gas consumption are lower this year despite a sweltering July, signaling the nation's clean energy push is paying off.

】

item.title: 德国 PBB 银行寻求 SRT 帮助退出美国商业地产
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国商业信贷银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG）正在进行首次重大风险转移，该风险转移与数十亿美元的美国商业房地产贷款有关，因为这家德国贷款机构正寻求退出美国市场。【原文：Deutsche Pfandbriefbank AG is working on a debut significant risk transfer tied to billions of dollars of US commercial real estate loans, according to people familiar with the matter, as the German lender seeks to exit the US market.】

item.title: 交易员押注英国央行将在 2025 年剩余时间内将利率维持在 4% 的水平
item.description: 由于通胀加快和经济更具弹性的迹象削弱了更多宽松政策的理由，货币市场进一步押注英国央行将在今年剩余时间内将利率维持在 4% 的水平。【原文：Money markets are adding to bets the Bank of England will keep interest rates on hold at 4% for the rest of this year as signs of faster inflation and a more resilient economy reduce the case for more easing.】

item.title: 特朗普未完成的协议令贸易伙伴担忧 承诺削减关税
item.description: 当然，在美国总统周五为俄罗斯领导人弗拉基米尔-普京铺上红地毯之后，许多人都希望能达成协议，结束乌克兰战争。但还记得唐纳德-特朗普几周前宣布的那些贸易协议吗？它们已经变成了一个潜在的警示故事。【原文：Many people are, of course, hoping an agreement may be nigh to end the war in Ukraine after the US president rolled out the red carpet for Russian leader Vladimir Putin on Friday. But remember all those trade deals Donald Trump announced a few weeks ago? They are already turning into a potential cautionary tale.】

item.title: 意大利关键收益率逼近法国，交易商重新审视欧洲风险
item.description: 意大利和法国基准借贷成本的差距一度缩小到 10 个基点以下，反映出投资者对欧洲政府债务的评级方式发生了变化。【原文：The once-yawning gap between Italian and French benchmark borrowing costs shrunk to below 10 basis points, reflecting a shift in how investors rank European government debt.】

item.title: 南非对美国的农产品出口在巨额关税前猛增 26
item.description: 南非对美国的农产品出口在美国计划征收 30% 关税之前大幅增长，部分原因是农业丰收和全球商品价格上涨。【原文：South Africa’s agricultural exports to the US surged ahead of a planned 30% tariff, partly due to a bountiful harvest and higher global commodity prices.】

item.title: 新云运营商依赖 Nvidia 芯片维持高价
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，埃德-勒德洛（Ed Ludlow）回顾了他对 CoreWeave 首席执行官的采访，以及采访对我们构建专业人工智能云基础设施的风险业务有何启示。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ed Ludlow reflects on his interview with CoreWeave’s CEO and what it tells us about the risky business of building specialized AI cloud infrastructure.】

item.title: 印尼新总统期待国家推动经济增长
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济编辑。今天我们关注的是印尼总统以国家为中心的增长战略。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics editor in Sydney. Today we’re looking at the state-focused growth strategy of Indonesia’s president. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 智利市场打破末日预言
item.description: 上周二，智利总统候选人何塞-安东尼奥-卡斯特（Jose Antonio Kast）在拉丁美洲一家知名资产管理公司举办的活动上，面对数百名投资者上台演讲，传达了一个信息："我们正处于紧急状态"。卡斯特指出了不断上升的犯罪率和非法移民问题，但同时也强调了他认为该国正在经历的经济紧急状况。他告诉听众，巨大的挑战需要激进的解决方案。【原文：Chile’s presidential front-runner Jose Antonio Kast walked on stage last Tuesday to speak in front of hundreds of investors at an event organized by a leading Latin American asset manager to get one message across: “We are in an emergency.” Kast pointed to rising crime and illegal immigration but also honed in on the economic emergency he believes the country is going through. Big challenges called for radical solutions, he told the audience.】

item.title: Soho House 同意在 27 亿美元的交易中被私有化
item.description: 一组投资者同意将 Soho House & Co.私有化，这笔交易使这家会员俱乐部的企业价值达到约 27 亿美元。【原文：A group of investors agreed to take Soho House & Co. private in a deal that gives the members’ club an enterprise value of about $2.7 billion.】

item.title: 乌克兰和美联储会议前新兴市场资产走高
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）举行会谈之前，发展中国家资产上涨，投资者正在关注俄乌和平协议取得进展的迹象。【原文：Developing-nation assets inched up ahead of talks between US President Donald Trump and his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelenskiy, with investors watching for signs of progress toward a Russia-Ukraine peace deal.】

item.title: 鲍威尔有理由对冲杰克逊霍尔的信号，因为数据呈 "之 "字形变化
item.description: 杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周五有一个理想的平台，可以发出美联储即将恢复降息的明确信号。但经济并没有向他发出同样明确的信号：现在是时候了。【原文：Jerome Powell has the ideal platform Friday to deliver a clear signal the Federal Reserve is about to resume cutting interest rates. But the economy isn’t giving him an equally clear signal that now is the time.】

item.title: 道富证券称全球投资者减少美元套期保值交易
item.description: 根据道富证券（State Street）的数据，全球投资者已将对美元走软的对冲减少到接近 4 月份关税动荡冲击市场之前的水平。【原文：Global investors have reduced their hedges against a weaker dollar to near levels seen before tariff turmoil shook markets in April, according to State Street.】

item.title: 极端天气持续，西班牙和葡萄牙野火蔓延
item.description: 由于高温和狂风使大火在干燥的灌木丛、森林和农作物中蔓延，数千名消防员通宵工作，以控制在西班牙和葡萄牙各地燃烧的数十处致命野火。【原文：Thousands of firefighters worked overnight to contain dozens of deadly wildfires burning across Spain and Portugal as heat and gusty winds spread blazes through dry brush, forests and crops.】

item.description: 日本零售商泛太平洋国际控股公司（Pan Pacific International Holdings Corp.【原文：Japanese retailer Pan Pacific International Holdings Corp. plans to open 250 new stores by 2035, in a bet on continued surging foreign tourism.】
